Cutie didn't know what to do. He didn't know if there were even any 
transformers on Earth let alone on this contientient. And he had no 
means of going from contienient to contienent. He began toward the 
future city of Atlanta, Ga..

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> He sent out a message:
> 
> My name is Cuttie. I am a Maximal. If there are any Transformers on 
> this planet, preferable friendly, please come and see me.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > Now where was I. Cutie entered the area that would later be 
Augusta 
> > Georgia (I don't want you to know exactly where I live now do I). 
He 
> > then laid down clutching a small disk close to his heart. It 
showed 
> a 
> > press conference with Optimus Prime after they arrived back on 
> > Cybertron. He didn't care his shuttle had crashed. This was the 
> right 
> > planet, he had been going for the 20th-21st century but when 
didn't 
> > matter. Optimus had spoken for 4 mega cycles. He mentioned 
several 
> > Earth legends. Among them was the fountain of youth. After 
finding 
> the 
> > disk Cutie had worked for 10 stellar cycles to find out where 
Earth 
> > was. Now he could find the fountain of youth (one of the few 
known 
> > legends with no known root in true history or nature) and pray it 
> > worked on bots.
> > 
> > OOC: If you want to complain cutties stupid talk to whoever came 
up 
> > with Bob first.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > Is it my fault my superior intellect (this is the way
> > > I talk when I don't have time to think out what I say
> > > which is pretty much whenever I'm not typing) I have
> > > gained extreme amounts of imagination, and hense
> > > impationse with such things as rpgs. Also my concept
> > > of our galaxy being a generator made scientific since.
> > > The planets orbit like turbines for billions of years
> > > before falling away.
> > > 
> > > --- The Beam <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> > > > OOC:  Hey Kyle Stewart/dewboy/any other dumb names
> > > > you call yourself!  LegendaryNemasis is a truckload
> > > > smarter and better than you!  If you haven't guessed
> > > > already, nobody likes you, almost as much as we
> > > > don't like KSLa-I mean, you...

> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > > OOC: My rabbit died last night so I'm going to
> > > > make a new Maximal in 
> > > > > his honor. By the way I would do this in polls but
> > > > no one's answering 
> > > > > mine anymore and I want comments about your
> > > > opinions. Would you be 
> > > > > willing to have a char in a faction made entirely
> > > > of proto-humans 
> > > > > trying to banish the "demons" from their planets,
> > > > and should they be 
> > > > > allowed to use magic and energon spear and
> > > > hammerheads to even the 
> > > > > odds. If I get 3 supporting replies and no
> > > > negative ones I'll do it 
> > > > > (forget it Nemisis you don't count).
> > > > > 
> > > > > A shuttle is crashing to earth.  It lands in North
> > > > America. It scans a 
> > > > > small, black and white rabbit. A bot of 80 stellar
> > > > cycles steps out 
> > > > > (he was 8).
> > > > > 
> > > > > Old Bot: I look almost as cute as I did when I was
> > > > 20. Just in a 
> > > > > different way. From now on everyone can call me
> > > > Cutie just like the 
> > > > > ladies did.  BEAST MODE!
> > > > > 
> > > > > He happily hops away.
> > > > > 
> > > > > OOC: Does anyone know how I can make my dialogue
> > > > less sketchy (shut up
